description: Demolition of an existing rear conservatory, erection of a single storey rear orangery extension, removal of existing rear dormer, lowering of existing chimney stack. Installation of 4nos rear rooflights. Alterations to window/door openings. Replacement of materials to match the existing style.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows or rooflights at  Proposed Loft Level or above in the  Proposed Side Elevation ( Proposed Loft and Roof Plans & Sections Dwg no P02 - Rev P1)   shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The works shall be carried out and maintained in accordance with the deposited Fire Statement compliant with Policy D12(A).Reason: In the interests of fire safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire Safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The new windows and doors hereby approved shall have the same window and door reveals and recesses as the existing windows and doors. In addition, the replacement windows and doors are to be of a matching style and materials as the existing. Reason : To ensure a satisfactory appearance on the completion of the development in  accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy (2012).
